pages.text: 70|40|to main shapath leta hoon poorvon (sooryoday ke sthaanon) tatha pashchimon (sooryaast ke sthaanon) kee, vaastav mein ham avashy saamarthyavaan hain.
70|41|is baat par ki badal den unase uttam (utpatti) ko tatha ham vivash nahin hain.
70|42|atah, aap unhen jhagadate tatha khelate chhod den, yahaan tak ki ve mil jaayen apane us din se, jisaka unhen vachan diya ja raha hai.
70|43|jis din ve nikalenge qabron (aur samaadhiyon) se, daudate hue, jaise ve apanee moortiyon kee or daud rahe hon.
70|44|jhukee hongee unakee aankhen, chhaaya hoga unapar apamaan, yahee vah din hai jisaka vachan unhen diya ja[1] raha tha.
71|1|nihsandeh, hamane bheja nooh ko usakee jaati kee or ki saavadhaan kar apanee jaati ko, isase poorv ki aaye unake paas, doohkhadaayee yaatana.
71|2|usane kahaah he meree jaati! vaastav mein, main khula saavadhaan karane vaala hoon, tumhen.
71|3|ki ibaadat (vandana) karo allaah kee tatha daro usase aur baat maano meree.

71|4|vah kshama kar dega tumahaare lie tumhaare paapon ko tatha avasar dega tumhen nirdhaarit samay[1] tak. vaastav mein, jab allaah ka nirdhaarit samay aa jaayega, to usamen der na hogee. kaash tum jaanate
71|5|nooh ne kahaah mere paalanahaar! mainne bulaaya apanee jaati ko (teree or) raat aur din.
71|6|to mere bulaave ne unake bhaagane hee ko adhik kiya.
71|7|aur mainne jab-jab unhen bulaaya, to unhonne de leen apanee ungaliyaan apane kaanon mein tatha odh lie apane kapade[1] tatha ade rah gaye aur bada ghamand kiya.
71|8|phir mainne unhen uchch svar mein bulaaya.
71|9|phir mainne unase khulakar kaha aur unase dheere-dheere (bhee) kaha.
71|10|mainne kahaah kshama maango apane paalanahaar se, vaastav mein vah bada kshamaasheel hai.
